alert.note: Alert for Cocke; Greene; Hamblen; Jefferson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 03 at 3:25PM CDT until August 03 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTHWESTERN COCKE, CENTRAL GREENE, SOUTHEASTERN HAMBLEN AND EAST CENTRAL JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 425 PM EDT, local law enforcement reported heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2.5 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Morristown, Greeneville, Tusculum, White Pine, Mosheim, Bulls Gap, Mohawk, Lowland, Bybee, Chucky and Davy Crockett Birthplace. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
